Lightbox

Use a lightbox to allow the user to select an image and enlarge it.

Installation 

                  
                    npm i @govflanders/vl-ui-lightbox

or 

                  
                    yarn add @govflanders/vl-ui-lightbox

Usage

Import SASS 

                  
                  @import "vl-ui-lightbox/src/scss/lightbox";

Make sure your sass --include-path includes node_modules/@govflanders/.

Import JS

                  
                  import { Lightbox } from '@govflanders/vl-ui-lightbox';

Use a figure tag that includes an a-tag and a figcaption tag. The a-tag should also include an i, and the .vl-vi and .vl-vi-expand icons. These icons inform the user that the image can be magnified. Finally the a-tag should contain the image tag.

      
    <div class="vl-lightbox" data-vl-lightbox><figure class="vl-lightbox__item" data-vl-lightbox-item itemprop="associatedMedia" itemscope
          itemtype="http://schema.org/ImageObject" data-vl-lightbox-size="2048x1366">

Accessibility

Don't forget to add descriptive alt texts for the images.
